system.benefit: When an ally within 12 squares hits with a lightsaber, you gain hit points equal to 3 × class level.
system.description: When an ally within 12 squares hits with a lightsaber, gain hit points equal to three times your class level.

system.benefit: Life-drain attack vs a creature within 6 squares: ranged attack vs Fortitude; on hit deals and heals d6 per class level.
system.description: Drain life from a creature within 6 squares, dealing damage and healing yourself.

system.benefit: Use Charisma modifier in place of Strength modifier with light melee weapons or a lightsaber.
system.description: You may use Charisma instead of Strength for attacks with light melee weapons or lightsabers.

system.benefit: Use the Force instead of Initiative; you are considered trained in Initiative.
system.description: You may use Use the Force instead of Initiative and are considered trained in Initiative.

system.benefit: Once per turn, when an ally in line of sight is missed by a ranged attack, compare the missed attack against an adjacent enemy to see if it hits.
system.description: A missed ranged attack may hit an adjacent enemy instead.

system.benefit: Allies within 12 squares may reroll Initiative; if allies are surprised but not you, prevent surprise for up to one ally per your Wisdom modifier.
system.description: Allies within 12 squares may reroll Initiative; a number of allies avoid surprise.

system.benefit: +5 Will Defense vs checks to read your emotions; when you feint in combat, the target is flat-footed against you.
system.description: Gain +5 Will Defense against checks to read your emotions; feinted enemies are flat-footed.

system.benefit: Once per encounter when attacked, you can move your speed as an immediate reaction.
system.description: Once per encounter when attacked, move your speed.

system.benefit: Your Use Computer check result replaces a computer’s Will Defense to change its attitude; the computer is considered unfriendly.
system.description: Use Computer replaces Will Defense to alter a computer's attitude.

system.benefit: When you use Adapt and Survive, the enemy in line of sight is denied that bonus.
system.description: When you use Adapt and Survive, deny the bonus to the enemy.

system.prerequisites: Dual Weapon Mastery II, Dual Weapon Flourish I, Master of Elegance
system.benefit: With two light melee weapons or two lightsabers, you may make a full attack as a standard action when using both weapons (once per turn).
system.description: Once per turn, make a full attack as a standard action when using two light melee weapons or lightsabers.

system.benefit: When using a ranged weapon as a melee weapon, gain +2 melee attack.
system.description: When using a ranged weapon as a melee weapon, gain +2 melee attack.

system.benefit: When you make a ranged attack, allies within 6 squares gain +1 Defense until your next turn.
Once per turn, if you are damaged by an attack of opportunity, make a single attack against a target.
system.description: Once per turn, if damaged, make a single attack against a target.

system.benefit: Reroll Persuasion checks when haggling for restricted, military, or illegal goods.
system.description: Reroll Persuasion checks when haggling for restricted or illegal goods.

system.benefit: If you hit, grant an ally a damage bonus equal to their level.
system.description: When you hit a target, grant an ally a damage bonus equal to their level.

system.benefit: Enemies firing into your Safe Zone take a -2 penalty to attack.
system.description: Enemies firing into your safe zone take –2 attack.

system.benefit: Reroll Stealth checks.
system.description: Reroll Stealth checks and keep the better result.

system.benefit: Mind-affecting effects against you are rolled twice and you take the lower result.
system.description: Mind-affecting effects must be rolled twice against you, taking the lower result.

system.benefit: Regain 2 Force powers when a Force Point is spent to regain a power.
Deal sneak attack damage when you use Skirmisher.
system.description: Deal Sneak Attack damage when using Skirmisher.

system.benefit: When you spend a Force Point to activate a technique or secret, you gain hit points equal to 10 + class level.
system.description: When you spend a Force Point to activate a technique or secret, gain hit points equal to 10 + your class level.

system.benefit: +1 attack vs Jedi.
system.description: Gain +1 attack against Jedi.

system.benefit: Once per day, use a swift action in place of a move or standard action to activate a Force power.
system.description: Once per day, activate a Force power as a swift action.

system.benefit: Reroll Persuasion checks when attempting to Intimidate.
When you move one adjacent ally, that ally moves and ends adjacent to you; cannot exceed the ally’s movement.
system.description: When you move, one adjacent ally may move with you and remain adjacent, not exceeding the ally's speed.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, move up to your speed.
system.description: Once per encounter, move up to your speed.

system.benefit: Automatically shift an unfriendly beast to indifferent.
system.description: Automatically shift an unfriendly beast's attitude to indifferent.

system.benefit: Use the Force replaces Knowledge when untrained and is treated as trained.
system.description: Use the Force replaces Knowledge skills if untrained; you are considered trained.

system.benefit: You can move into the same space as a frigate or larger without collision and may occupy the same space.
system.description: You may move into the same space as a frigate-sized or larger vehicle without collision and occupy the same space.

system.benefit: Your guardian spirit reveals immediate consequences of your actions; gain 1 bonus Force Point per day after 6 hours rest to enhance a Force power, technique, or secret.
system.description: Your guardian spirit grants insight and one bonus Force Point per day after rest.

system.benefit: If you miss with a melee attack or your attack is negated, still deal your Strength bonus damage (minimum 1), or double your Strength bonus if attacking two-handed.
system.description: If a melee attack misses or is negated, still deal Strength bonus damage (minimum 1).

system.benefit: May apply Dexterity modifier to damage or double Dexterity bonus if two-handed instead of Strength.
system.description: Add Dexterity modifier to damage, or double Dexterity bonus if two-handed, instead of Strength.

system.benefit: While fighting defensively, deal +1 die damage with lightsaber and gain +2 to Block and Deflect.
system.description: When fighting defensively, deal +1 die damage with lightsabers and gain +2 to Block and Deflect.

system.benefit: Against a vehicle two sizes bigger that must be adjacent, make an opposed Pilot check; if you win, your attack vs that target +2 and their attacks vs you -2.
system.description: When adjacent to a vehicle two sizes larger, make an opposed Pilot check; you gain +2 attack and the target takes –2 attack.

system.benefit: Treat armor proficiency as Armor Proficiency (heavy).
system.description: You are treated as having Armor Proficiency (heavy).

swse.description: Your armor proficiency is treated as heavy armor proficiency

system.benefit: Treat your ship as two size categories smaller when making Stealth checks.
system.description: Your vehicle is treated as two size categories smaller for Stealth checks.

system.benefit: Grant +1 to all Defenses.
system.description: Gain +1 bonus to all defenses.

system.benefit: If you move an opponent down the condition track, they take +1d6 damage.
system.description: When you move an opponent down the condition track, they take +1d6 damage.

system.benefit: Full-round action; move +2 steps up the condition track.
Persuasion in a 6-square cone to intimidate multiple targets instead of single target.
system.description: When using Force Interrogation, intimidate all enemies in a 6-square cone instead of a single target.

system.benefit: A recruited enemy may immediately use Second Wind as a reaction.
Damage healed with Vital Transfer increases by 1 point per class level.
system.description: Increase damage healed by Vital Transfer by 1 point per class level.

system.benefit: Make Deception vs Will Defense within 6 squares and line of sight to impose -5 attack vs you until the start of their next turn.
system.description: Make a Deception check vs Will Defense against a target within 6 squares; the target takes –5 attack against you until the start of your next turn.

system.benefit: When making an area attack, you can exclude a number of targets up to your Wisdom modifier.
system.description: Your area Force attacks may exclude a number of targets equal to your Wisdom modifier.

system.benefit: Make a Persuasion cone (6 squares) vs Will; targets lose their swift action on their next turn and cannot take a full-round action.
system.description: Make a Persuasion check vs Will Defense in a 6-square cone; the target loses its swift action on its next turn and cannot take full-round actions.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, move every ship in your squadron +1 up the condition track.
system.description: Once per encounter, move every ship in your squadron one step up the condition track.

system.benefit: When you damage a target with a non-area attack, one ally in line of sight treats that target as flat-footed.
system.description: When you damage a target with a non-area attack, one ally in line of sight treats the target as flat-footed.

system.benefit: If benefiting from cover, increase cover by one step.
system.description: Increase the benefits of cover by one step.

system.benefit: For powered weapons you are using, gain +1 attack and +2 damage for the rest of the encounter.
system.description: Powered weapons you use gain +1 attack and +2 damage for the encounter.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, after you damage an opponent, you may move your speed.
system.description: Once per encounter, after dealing damage you may move your speed.

system.benefit: On a natural 20 with a Force power, immediately reuse Force disarm, grip, slam, thrust, or Move Object.
system.description: When you roll a natural 20 using certain telekinetic powers, immediately reuse the power.

system.benefit: Opponents with level equal or lower to your heroic level within 6 squares take -1 attack.
system.description: Opponents of equal or lower level within 6 squares take –1 attack.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, you gain hit points equal to 10 + half your Heroic Level.
system.description: Once per encounter, gain hit points equal to 10 + half your heroic level.

system.benefit: One opponent loses their Strength bonus to melee attack rolls against you (does not affect damage).
system.description: One opponent you grapple loses their Strength bonus to melee attack rolls against you.

system.benefit: Select a single Force power; when using that power and spending a Force Point, return all spent uses of that power to your suite.
system.description: Select one Force power; when you use it and spend a Force Point, regain all spent uses of that power.

system.benefit: Can make attacks of opportunity with vehicle weapons.
system.description: You may make attacks of opportunity with vehicle weapons.

system.benefit: Until end of encounter, all squares within 2 squares of you are difficult terrain for enemies.
system.description: Enemies treat all squares within 2 squares as difficult terrain until end of encounter.

system.benefit: Increase critical range of rifles by 1.
system.description: With rifles, increase the weapon's critical threat range by 1.

system.benefit: Attempts to move you involuntarily suffer a -5 penalty to their check or attack.
Once per encounter, when you take Second Wind, make a free charge.
system.description: Once per encounter, make a free charge when you use Second Wind.

system.benefit: When you damage a target with a ranged attack, one ally in line of sight ignores that target’s Damage Reduction and Shield Rating.
system.description: When you damage a target with a ranged attack, one ally in line of sight ignores the target's damage reduction and shield rating.

system.benefit: If the opponent is flat-footed or denied Dexterity to Defense, deal +1d6 damage within 6 squares (maximum 10d6).
system.description: Deal +1d6 damage against flat-footed or Dexterity-denied opponents.

system.benefit: You or an ally within 12 squares may gain +5 Reflex Defense when attacked by making a Use the Force check vs target's Will; spend one Farseeing; you take -5 Use the Force until the start of your next turn.
While you are in cover, gain Damage Reduction equal to your class level provided you still have cover when attacked.
system.description: While in cover, gain damage reduction equal to your class level as long as you still have cover when attacked.

system.benefit: If adjacent to a creature, gain +2 Reflex Defense until you are no longer adjacent or until your next turn.
system.description: If adjacent to another creature, gain +2 Reflex Defense until your next turn or until no longer adjacent.

system.benefit: May use Block and Deflect to protect an adjacent ally.
system.description: You may use Block and Deflect to protect an adjacent ally.

system.benefit: Repair as a standard action once per day per droid, object, or vehicle.
system.description: Repair droids, objects, or vehicles as a standard action once per day per target.

system.benefit: No penalty on Survival checks to track at normal speed.
system.description: Track at normal speed without penalty.

system.benefit: Once per turn, one vehicle in your line of sight that can hear you ignores difficult terrain and gains +5 Pilot to avoid hazards.
system.description: Once per turn, a vehicle in line of sight may ignore difficult terrain and gain +5 Pilot to avoid hazards.

system.benefit: With chosen proficient weapon, reduce opponent's DR by 10 (replaces Penetrating Attack).
system.description: With a chosen weapon, reduce the target's damage reduction by 10 instead of 5.

system.benefit: Deal +2 damage against targets damaged by an ally since the end of your last turn.
system.description: Designate a vehicle or target; batteries deal extra damage when using Tactical Fire.

system.benefit: When a turret is reduced to 0 hp it self-destructs in a 2-square radius dealing its normal damage; you may disable it as a reaction if adjacent.
system.description: When a turret is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a 2-square radius dealing its normal damage.

system.benefit: Use the Force replaces Treat Injury; you can treat without a medkit or medpac and are considered trained.
system.description: Use the Force replaces Treat Injury; you may treat without a medkit or medpac.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, ignore a single target’s DR for the rest of your turn.
system.description: Once per encounter, ignore a target's damage reduction for your turn.

system.benefit: Perform coup de grace as a move action; if you kill with a coup de grace all allies in line of sight gain +2 attack for the encounter.
system.description: Perform a coup de grace as a move action; if you kill with it, allies in line of sight gain +2 attack for the encounter.

system.benefit: Increase your Dark Side Score by 1 to stop moving down the condition track.
system.description: Increase your Dark Side Score by 1 to prevent moving down the condition track.

system.benefit: If you end your movement adjacent to an opponent and they withdraw, you can move with them.
If you resist a mind-affecting Force power, the user cannot use that same power against you again.
system.description: If you resist a mind-affecting Force power, the user cannot use that power against you again.

system.benefit: 1/encounter deploy improved Tiny turret: Init +8, Perception +8, Reflex Def 12, 15 hp, threshold 10, damage 3d8; remote range 12 squares.
system.description: Once per encounter, deploy a more powerful blaster turret that may be controlled remotely within 12 squares.

system.benefit: Make Deception vs Will Defense to move through a threatened area without provoking attacks of opportunity; movement through the area counts as 2 squares.
system.description: Use Deception vs Will Defense to move through threatened squares without provoking attacks.

system.benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for heavy weapons.
system.description: Reduce attack penalties for multiple attacks with heavy weapons by 2.

system.benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense within 12 squares; target’s speed is -2 and must spend a swift action with their standard action until their next turn.
system.description: Use Persuasion vs Will Defense to reduce an enemy's speed and actions.

system.benefit: One ally in line of sight who has cover is treated as having improved cover while they still have cover.
system.description: One ally in line of sight who has cover is treated as having improved cover as long as they retain cover.

system.prerequisites: Tech Specialist, Repairs on the Fly
system.benefit: When creating a field-created weapon, add one modification at creation.
system.description: When creating a field weapon, add one Tech Specialist modification at creation.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, allies in line of sight gain +4 flanking bonus to melee attacks.
system.description: Once per encounter, allies in line of sight gain a +4 flanking bonus to melee attacks.

system.benefit: If a recruited enemy is at 0 hp or bottom of track, you and all allies in line of sight gain hit points equal to 10 + your class level.
system.description: When a recruited enemy is defeated, allies gain hit points.

system.benefit: When targeted by mind-affecting powers, they automatically take damage equal to 1d6 × your Wisdom modifier (minimum ×1).
system.description: When targeted by mind-affecting powers, the attacker automatically takes damage equal to 1d6 × your Wisdom modifier.

system.benefit: If you are moved by a Force power, reduce the movement distance by half.
system.description: When moved by a Force power, reduce the distance moved by half.

system.benefit: Once per encounter when you damage a Force-sensitive opponent, regain one Force power and the target loses one Force Point.
system.description: Once per encounter, when you damage a Force-sensitive opponent, regain one Force power and the target loses one Force Point.

system.benefit: Negate forced movement when being moved against your will.
system.description: Negate forced movement against your will.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, reroll a failed skill check with a +2 bonus.
system.description: Once per encounter, reroll a failed skill check with a +2 bonus.

system.benefit: Aim with one swift action at a target not in point-blank range.
system.description: You may aim at a target outside point-blank range using only a swift action.

system.benefit: Reduce range penalties by one category (for example, short becomes point-blank).
system.description: Reduce range penalties by one category.

system.benefit: With two pistols, attack as if autofire even without autofire, applying autofire penalties.
system.description: When wielding two pistols, you may attack as if using autofire; autofire penalties apply.

system.benefit: +1 attack aboard starships, including with personal weapons.
system.description: Gain +1 attack aboard starships with personal weapons.

system.benefit: If within 10 squares of an ally, gain +2 Damage Reduction.
system.description: While within 10 squares of an ally, gain +2 damage reduction.

system.benefit: Gain +1 to Fortitude and Will Defense and deal +1 die damage against Force-sensitives.
system.description: Gain +1 Fortitude and Will Defense and deal +1 die damage against Force-sensitive opponents.

system.benefit: On a successful ram as a pilot, you take half the ram damage; if target is same size or smaller, it cannot move next round.
system.description: On a successful ram, you take half damage; if the target is the same size or smaller, it cannot move next round.

system.benefit: Allies gain +5 Will Defense vs fear while in line of sight and you remain conscious.
system.description: Allies gain +5 Will Defense against fear effects while you are conscious.

system.benefit: When you successfully parry a lightsaber attack, you may make an immediate attack against that attacker.
system.description: When you successfully parry a lightsaber attack, you may make an immediate attack against the attacker.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, move your speed.
system.description: Once per encounter, move your speed.

system.benefit: If a weapon you draw is unnoticed, the opponent is flat-footed; you may use Quick Draw as a swift action.
system.description: If a concealed weapon you draw is unnoticed, the opponent is flat-footed; you may use Quick Draw as a swift action.

system.benefit: Use the Force vs Will; the target does not remember interacting with you (+5 bonus if opponent is higher level).
Designate a single vehicle, object, or creature in line of sight; gain extra damage dice for batteries (scaling every 2 batteries) and may designate one weapon or battery to make a single attack.
Once per encounter, when you deal damage, all allies gain +1 attack and +1 die of damage on non-area attacks for the remainder of the encounter.
system.description: When you deal damage, allies gain bonuses to attack and damage for the encounter.

system.benefit: Once per turn, make an opposed Initiative check vs your prime target; if you win, the prime target is flat-footed against you.
system.description: Make a melee attack; if it hits, deal no damage but force the target to move or withdraw next turn.

system.benefit: Includes Acquire Equipment or Funds, Obtain Info, Receive Medical Attention, and Secure Safe House benefits.
system.description: Gain access to Acquire Equipment or Funds, Obtain Information, Medical Aid, or a Safe House.

system.benefit: Once per round when damaged, move 1 square as a reaction without provoking attacks of opportunity.
system.description: Once per round when damaged, move 1 square as a reaction without provoking attacks of opportunity.

system.benefit: When you attack: redirect the attack to your follower, move your follower toward the target, or impose -1 attack per follower on ranged attacks against the target.
system.description: Redirect attacks to followers and penalize enemy attacks.

system.benefit: Establish a Use the Force link within 1 km to communicate as if speaking; once per encounter, may share a Force power between you and the linked ally.
system.description: Communicate telepathically with an ally within 1 km once per encounter.

system.benefit: Not restricted to a straight line when running; may reroll Endurance checks.
system.description: You are not restricted to a straight line when running and may reroll Endurance checks.

system.benefit: One-handed lightsabers are treated as light for shoto; may activate Lightsaber Defense as a free action with a shoto.
system.description: A one-handed lightsaber is considered light when used with a shoto; you may activate Lightsaber Defense as a free action when wielding a shoto.

system.benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for exotic weapons.
system.description: Reduce the attack penalty for making multiple attacks with exotic weapons by 2.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, make a melee attack then move your speed away without provoking attacks of opportunity.
system.description: Once per encounter, make a melee attack and then move your speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

system.benefit: If you damage your Hunter's Target, all allies gain +2 on their next attack vs that target until the start of your next turn.
system.description: When you damage your Hunter's Target, allies gain +2 attack on their next attack against it.

system.benefit: Once per encounter when making a ranged attack not at point-blank range, ignore the target's armor bonus to Reflex Defense.
system.description: Once per encounter, ignore the target's armor bonus to Reflex Defense on a ranged attack outside point-blank range.

system.benefit: If you deal damage exceeding the target’s threshold, make Persuasion as a free action vs Will Defense; target flees for one minute but can spend a Force Point (or if higher level) to negate.
system.description: If you deal damage over the threshold, force a target to flee for one minute.

system.benefit: If you take damage from a Force power, gain +2 to all Defense scores against that power until the end of the encounter.
Designate an unaware target within 12 squares; until your next turn that target cannot make Perception checks against you.
system.description: Designate an unaware target within 12 squares; until your next turn, the target cannot make Perception checks against you.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, move up to half your speed on a vehicle, or half the vehicle’s speed if you are the pilot, without provoking attacks of opportunity.
system.description: Once per encounter, move without provoking attacks of opportunity while aboard a vehicle.

system.benefit: You or an ally within 12 squares may reroll a missed attack by making a Use the Force check vs target's Will; spend one Farseeing; you take -5 Use the Force until the start of your next turn.
Once per day, add your class level to an attack, skill, or ability check.
system.description: Once per day, add your class level to an attack roll, skill check, or ability check.

system.benefit: Followers gain the Toughness feat.
system.description: Your followers gain the Toughness feat.

system.benefit: When you damage an opponent with a Force power, make a Persuasion check to intimidate.
system.description: When you damage an opponent with a Force power, you may make a Persuasion check to intimidate the target.

system.benefit: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, you may spend a Force Point to make the opponent flat-footed until the end of your next turn.
Attract nonheroic minions with levels equal to 3/4 your level; may have multiple minions.
system.description: Attract a nonheroic minion of level equal to three-quarters your level; may be taken multiple times.

system.benefit: +2 Reflex Defense when adjacent to an obstacle or barrier.
Once per encounter, activate a Force power as a reaction if you are targeted by a Dark Side power.
When an ally within 12 squares hits with a lightsaber, deal +1 damage die on your next lightsaber attack.
system.description: When an ally within 12 squares hits with a lightsaber, deal +1 die of damage with your next lightsaber attack.

system.benefit: Aiming with stock extended does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
system.description: You do not provoke attacks of opportunity when using Aim with a rifle's stock extended.

system.benefit: You may make Treat Injury checks using natural substitutes without a medical kit.
system.description: You may make Treat Injury checks without a medical kit using natural substitutes.

system.benefit: When affected by a debilitating condition, convert its penalty into a bonus for 1 round, then move down the condition track.
With a melee attack against a target with your allies adjacent, if you also exceed Fortitude Defense, the target’s speed is -2 and takes -2 Reflex Defense on its next turn.
system.description: When attacking with allies adjacent and exceeding Fortitude Defense, target takes –2 speed and –2 Reflex Defense until next turn.

system.benefit: Use the Force replaces Use Computer for astrogation checks.
system.description: Use the Force instead of Use Computer for astrogation.

system.benefit: Once per round, when damaged by an area attack, make an attack against the source if you have line of sight and range.
system.description: Once per round when damaged by an area attack, make an attack against the source if you have line of sight.

system.benefit: You can communicate in full sentences and complete thoughts telepathically without altering the subject.
system.description: You may communicate full sentences and complex thoughts telepathically.

system.benefit: Add your Charisma bonus to Perception checks.
system.description: Add your Charisma modifier to Perception checks.

system.benefit: Once per turn, grant use of a Force Secret to an ally within 12 squares who is trained in Use the Force.
system.description: Once per turn, grant use of a Force Secret to an ally within 12 squares trained in Use the Force.

system.benefit: Deal extra damage on melee attacks against Dark Side creatures equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum +1).
Once per encounter when you reduce an opponent to 0 hp, gain +5 attack on your next attack in the same encounter.
system.description: Once per encounter, when you reduce an opponent to 0 hit points, gain +5 attack with your next attack in the same encounter.

system.benefit: Once per day, grant use of a Lightsaber Combat tree, Duelist, or Forms talent to allies within 12 squares equal to half your class level for the encounter.
system.description: Once per day, grant allies use of Lightsaber Combat, Lightsaber Forms, or Duelist talents until the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: Reroll an attack against an opponent with a Dark Side Score of 1+.
system.description: Reroll an attack against a creature with a Dark Side Score.

system.benefit: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns while adjacent (effects do not stack).
system.description: Once per encounter, an adjacent ally gains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns (not cumulative).

system.benefit: Ignore all concealment for 1 minute.
system.description: Ignore all concealment for 1 minute.

system.benefit: Gain an additional +1 attack with lightsabers.
system.description: Gain +1 attack with lightsabers.

system.benefit: Reduce multiattack penalties with lightsabers by 2; may be taken multiple times.
system.description: Reduce the attack penalty for multiple attacks with lightsabers by 2; may be taken multiple times.

system.benefit: Use Computer replaces Deception when using forged documents.
system.description: Use Computer replaces Deception when creating forged documents.

system.benefit: A non-grenade explosive you set can turn normal terrain into difficult and difficult into normal.
system.description: Use explosives to alter terrain between normal and difficult terrain.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, one ally in line of sight adds your Wisdom bonus to Will Defense until end of encounter.
system.description: Once per encounter, one ally in line of sight adds your Wisdom modifier to Will Defense for the encounter.

system.benefit: If you parry a melee attack, immediately make an unarmed attack as a reaction against the attacker.
system.description: When you successfully parry a melee attack, make an immediate unarmed attack as a reaction.

system.benefit: Remove a debilitating condition affecting you and return to normal, including moving up to the top of the condition track.
system.description: Remove debilitating conditions and move up the condition track.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, make an attack of opportunity against an opponent that withdraws from an ally in point-blank range.
system.description: Once per encounter, make an attack of opportunity against a withdrawing opponent.

system.benefit: If you exceed Reflex Defense by 5 or more with a melee attack, deal +1 damage die per melee weapon group.
system.description: If you exceed Reflex Defense by 5 or more with a melee attack, deal +1 die of damage (per melee weapon group).

system.benefit: +5 Force bonus to all Defense scores against powers with the Dark Side descriptor and from Force users with a Dark Side score; effects scale with your Wisdom score.
If you feint in combat, you may move half your speed as part of the feint.
system.description: When you feint in combat, you may move up to half your speed.

system.benefit: Your guardian spirit is present for the encounter within 6 squares; while within 12 squares, you gain +1 attack, +2 Use the Force, and +2 Will Defense; you can move the spirit 6 squares as a swift action once per turn.
system.description: Summon your guardian spirit to grant bonuses to attack, Use the Force, and Will Defense.

system.benefit: Ignore cover for character-scale ranged attacks when aboard a starship or space station.
system.description: Ignore cover with character-scale ranged attacks aboard starships or space stations.

system.benefit: If you reduce your prime target to 0 hit points, designate a new prime target.
system.description: If you reduce your prime target to 0 hit points, designate a new prime target.

system.benefit: You may take 10 to increase speed; all-out movement is x5 instead of x4.
system.description: You may take 10 to increase speed; all-out movement increases speed by ×5 instead of ×4.

system.benefit: Gain DR 10 for one minute.
system.description: Gain damage reduction 10 for one minute.

system.benefit: Full-round action; one ally gains +5 on a skill check (or +10 if you spend a Force Point); cannot advise yourself.
When you roll Initiative, make Deception vs Will Defense against a target in line of sight; if successful, that target cannot attack you until you harm an ally.
system.description: If you win Initiative using Deception vs Will Defense, enemies cannot attack you until you harm an ally.

system.benefit: Once per turn when you redirect an attack, do not count the initial deflect penalty.
system.description: Once per turn, when you redirect an attack, the initial Deflect penalty does not apply.

system.benefit: When you jury-rig a vehicle, it regains hit points equal to your Mechanics check result.
system.description: When jury-rigging a vehicle, restore hit points equal to your Mechanics check.

system.benefit: Use Vital Transfer to move a target +1 up the condition track instead of healing; you move -1 down the track.
system.description: Use Vital Transfer to move a target one step up the condition track instead of healing; you move –1 down the track.

system.prerequisites: Martial Arts I-II, Teras Kasi Basics
system.benefit: When fighting defensively, may negate a melee attack using parry; if successful and attack beats your melee attack, negate the attack and apply -2 cumulative attack vs others.
system.description: When fighting defensively, negate a melee attack with an opposed melee attack roll; cumulative –2 attack penalty against other targets.

system.benefit: At every level, gain credits equal to class level × 5000.
system.description: Gain credits equal to character level × 5,000 each level.

system.benefit: Once per round, if you or an ally within 6 squares damage a target, allies in line of sight deal additional damage equal to half your class level to that target.
system.description: Once per round, when you or an ally damages a target, allies in line of sight gain bonus damage equal to half your class level.

system.benefit: Gain +2 melee attack and damage for a number of rounds equal to 5 + Constitution modifier, then move down one step on the condition track.
system.description: Gain +2 melee attack and damage for a number of rounds equal to 5 + Constitution modifier, then move –1 down the condition track.

system.benefit: Reduce an opponent’s damage threshold by 5 with a single weapon group.

swse.notes: Weapon group specific - applies when using designated weapon group

system.benefit: Once per encounter, coordinate an attack with an ally on the same target to overcome SR, DR, and Threshold together.
system.description: Once per encounter, treat your attack and an ally's attack against the same target as one against shields, damage reduction, and threshold.

system.benefit: Allies within 6 squares can reroll one Pilot check and keep the best (once per ally).
system.description: Allies within 6 squares may reroll one Pilot check each and keep the better result.

system.benefit: Your Reflex Defense bonus equals either your heroic level + half your armor bonus, or your armor bonus.
system.description: Your Reflex Defense bonus equals either your heroic level plus half your armor bonus or your armor bonus.

system.benefit: If a minion is killed, they are replaced by one of the same level after 24 hours.
system.description: If a minion is killed, it is replaced by another of the same level after 24 hours.

system.benefit: Forfeit the extra swift action to aim with one swift on your next turn.
system.description: Forgo an extra swift action to Aim as a swift action on your next turn.

system.prerequisites: Noble Fencing Style, base attack bonus +5
system.benefit: When you hit an opponent with a melee attack, you may deal half damage and switch positions with the foe; does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
system.description: You may deal half damage and switch places with the opponent without provoking attacks.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, when you intimidate, gain +1 per ally within 6 squares and the target’s line of sight (maximum +5).
system.description: Once per encounter, when you intimidate, gain +1 for each ally within 6 squares and the target's line of sight (max +5).

system.benefit: Once per encounter forgo the extra swift to attack; if you hit and damage with a ranged attack, count your and an ally's attack as one for overcoming DR/SR/Threshold.
system.description: Once per encounter, forgo an extra swift action to combine your ranged attack with an ally's for damage resolution.

system.benefit: When you roll a natural 20 on an attack or Use the Force, you may grant the linked ally a Force Point instead of gaining powers.
system.description: When you roll a natural 20, grant a Force Point to an ally instead of gaining one.

system.benefit: Once per round, make a vehicle weapon attack at -5 against an attacker of an adjacent allied colossal or smaller ship if your attack deals damage.
system.description: Once per round, make a vehicle weapon attack at –5 against an attacker who damages your ally.

system.benefit: Reroll Dark Side skills and Use the Force checks; afterwards you can no longer use light-side talents.
When you damage an opponent, you can use Consular's Vitality as a free action.
When you take a melee attack penalty of -1 to -5, apply double that number as a penalty to the target's Will Defense; may not exceed your base attack bonus.
Reduce autofire or burst-fire penalty by 2; if braced, no penalty.
system.description: Reduce autofire or Burst Fire penalties by 2; if braced, take no penalty.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, jury-rig an object that is not disabled.
system.description: Once per encounter, jury-rig an object that is not disabled.

system.benefit: You may make Knowledge checks untrained.
system.description: All Knowledge skills may be used untrained.

system.benefit: Once per day add half your officer class level to all Defenses for 1 round; must declare at start of your turn.
system.description: Once per day, add half your class level to all defenses for one round.

system.benefit: Designated ally can take a standard and a move action immediately or the effect is wasted.
system.description: An ally may immediately take both a move and standard action or lose them.

system.benefit: Add one dark side Force power to your suite; once per encounter use it without increasing your Dark Side score.
system.description: Add one Dark Side Force power and once per encounter use it without increasing Dark Side Score.

system.benefit: Enemies in line of sight take -2 to defenses until your next turn.
system.description: Enemies in line of sight take -2 to all defenses until your next turn.

system.benefit: Ally’s attack moves the target one additional step down the condition track.
system.description: An ally's attack moves the target an additional step down the condition track.

system.benefit: +2 melee damage.
system.description: Gain +2 damage with a chosen weapon.

system.benefit: When you deal damage, gain +5 Will Defense until your next turn unless you are surprised or flat-footed.
When flanked, gain +2 on unarmed attack rolls and damage.
system.description: If flanked, gain +2 on unarmed attack and damage rolls.

system.benefit: If flanked and wielding two pistols, make flanking attacks as a standard action instead of a full; must attack two targets.
system.description: If flanked while wielding two pistols, attack both flankers as a standard action instead of a full action.

system.benefit: If Recruit Enemy succeeds, allies gain +2 attack until end of encounter.
system.description: After successfully recruiting an enemy, allies gain +2 attack until the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: If unarmed and holding no items, double your Strength bonus on unarmed attacks.
system.description: When unarmed and holding no items, double your Strength bonus on unarmed attacks.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, all enemies take -2 Will Defense; Persuasion becomes a class skill for you.

Once per encounter, when you deal damage equal to the target’s current hp and threshold, make Persuasion vs Will Defense; on success deal half damage, move target -1 on track, and the target becomes friendly (higher-level targets get +5 on Will).
system.description: Once per encounter, convert a damaged enemy into an ally through Persuasion.

system.benefit: Gather Information checks to find you suffer a -5 penalty.
system.description: Gather Information checks made to track you take a –5 penalty.

system.benefit: Use the Force instead of Pilot; you are considered trained in Pilot.
system.description: Use the Force instead of Pilot and are considered trained in Pilot.

system.benefit: If you successfully use a mind-affecting power on a target, gain +2 on future mind-affecting powers against that target.
system.description: After successfully using a mind-affecting power, gain +2 on subsequent mind-affecting powers against the same target.

system.benefit: Each once per encounter: an ally within 6 squares gains +2 Reflex as a swift action; or when you attack and are attacked, the ally makes a free attack; or when attacked, allies in line of sight move 2 squares as a reaction.
system.description: Once per encounter, grant an ally a Reflex bonus, a free attack, or allow allies to reposition as reactions.

system.benefit: If you take damage for an ally, your damage threshold is +5.
system.description: When you take damage for an ally, your damage threshold increases by 5.

system.benefit: Apply Lightsaber Defense twice when wielding two lightsabers.
system.description: Double your Lightsaber Defense bonus when wielding two lightsabers.

system.benefit: Each follower gains the Coordinated Attack feat.
Ignore target’s armor bonus to Reflex Defense when disarming; once per encounter, gain +10 attack on a disarm attempt.
A poisoned target is denied Dexterity to Reflex Defense as long as they remain poisoned.
system.description: Poisoned targets are denied Dexterity to Reflex Defense.

system.benefit: Once per turn, make Persuasion vs Will Defense against all opponents in line of sight; the chosen target cannot attack you or one ally within 6 squares.
system.description: Once per turn, a Persuasion check prevents enemies in line of sight from attacking you or one ally.

system.benefit: Each time you are attacked, the opponent takes -2 to Will Defense until the end of their next turn.
system.description: Each time you are attacked, the attacker takes –2 to Will Defense until the end of your next turn.

system.benefit: Use the Force replaces Will Defense against Deception or Persuasion.
system.description: Use the Force replaces Will Defense against Deception or Persuasion.

system.benefit: With Knowledge (galactic lore) DC 15 + target level, learn the target’s level, classes, abilities, and Force/Destiny points.
system.description: Use Knowledge (galactic lore) to learn a target's level, classes, abilities, Force Points, and Destiny Points.

system.benefit: Use Deception to feint as a two-swift action against an opponent you threaten.
system.description: Use Deception to feint as two swift actions against opponents you threaten.

system.benefit: Once per day, friends may take 20 on a skill check with modifier equal to 5 + half your heroic level; time taken is 10 × result minimum.
system.description: Once per day, allies may take 20 on skill checks using your modifier.

system.benefit: With a lightsaber in two hands, if you move at least 1 square before your attack, add +1 damage die.
system.description: When wielding a lightsaber in two hands and moving at least 1 square before attacking, deal +1 die of damage.

system.benefit: With a stun weapon, gain +1 attack and +1 damage die (nonlethal).
system.description: When using a stun weapon, gain +1 attack and +1 die of damage.

system.benefit: Gain +2 attack with a selected vehicle type and may take 10 on Pilot checks for that vehicle.
system.description: Gain +2 attack with a selected vehicle type and may take 10 on Pilot checks with it.

system.benefit: If you hit an opponent you have marked, deal +1d6 damage.
system.description: When you hit a marked opponent, deal +1d6 damage.

system.benefit: Spend a power from your suite and give it to an ally trained in Use the Force within 12 squares and line of sight; lost if unused by end of encounter.
system.description: Spend a Force power to grant it to an ally trained in Use the Force; it is lost if unused by the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: With one light melee weapon or lightsaber, you can move your speed as a free action.
system.description: When wielding a single light melee weapon or lightsaber, move your speed as a free action.

system.benefit: When a readied action is triggered, your Initiative does not change.
system.description: When a readied action is triggered, your Initiative does not change.

system.benefit: If your attack moves a ship down the track, it may lose hyperdrive, weapons, or communications.
system.description: If a System Hit moves a ship down the track, disable one system such as weapons, hyperdrive, or communications.

system.benefit: When you and allies are not surprised, number of allies equal to your Charisma modifier benefit from Quick Draw.
system.description: When you and allies are not surprised, a number of allies equal to your Charisma modifier gain the benefits of Quick Draw.

system.benefit: As Focused Force Talisman but the Force Point does not count toward the one-per-turn limit.
system.description: As Focused Force Talisman, but the Force Point does not count against the one-per-turn limit.

system.benefit: When an enemy or ally within 20 squares is reduced to 0 hit points, you gain hit points equal to 5 + half your character level.
system.description: When any creature within range is reduced to 0 hit points, gain temporary hit points.

system.benefit: Your Reflex Defense bonus equals either your heroic level or your armor bonus.
system.description: Your Reflex Defense bonus equals either your heroic level or your armor bonus.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, when an enemy moves adjacent, expend one charge to fly, move your speed, or withdraw.
Make an Initiative check against an enemy in line of sight; the loser is flat-footed against the other.
system.description: Opposed Initiative check; the loser is flat-footed against the winner.

system.benefit: Against an enemy you just hit with a melee attack, deal half damage and impose -5 attack against you until your next turn; usable once per round.
system.description: After hitting an enemy, they take half damage and -5 attack against you until next turn.

system.benefit: Create Sith Amulets, Sith Armor, Sith Talismans, or Sith Weapons per Sith Alchemy rules.
All allies in sight gain +1 attack and +1 to skill checks for the encounter, or revive one unconscious ally.
system.description: All allies in sight gain +1 to attacks and skill checks for the encounter.

system.benefit: Once per encounter add half your class level to one Defense.
system.description: Once per encounter, add half your class level to one defense.

system.benefit: No penalty when using improvised weapons.
system.description: You take no penalties when using improvised weapons.

system.benefit: When you gain a level, gain bonus Force Points equal to number of Force Talents you possess (maximum 6).
system.description: When you gain a level, gain bonus Force Points equal to the number of Force talents you have (maximum 6).

system.benefit: The detection radius for you is 10 km instead of 100 km.
system.description: Reduce the range at which you can be detected by the Force to 10 km.

system.benefit: Increase the maximum Dexterity bonus you can apply while wearing armor by +1.
system.description: Your Reflex Defense bonus equals heroic level plus half armor bonus or armor bonus; counts as Armored and Improved Armored Defense.

system.prerequisites: Dual Weapon Mastery I, Weapon Finesse
system.benefit: With two light melee weapons or two lightsabers, when you make a full attack with one weapon you gain a free attack with the other.
system.description: When wielding two light melee weapons or lightsabers, gain a free attack with the second weapon during a full attack.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, Persuasion vs Will within line of sight can prevent the target from attacking you; if over by 5, they also cannot attack your allies.
system.description: Once per encounter, Persuasion vs Will Defense; the target cannot attack you, and if exceeded by 5, cannot attack your allies.

system.benefit: Once per encounter force all enemies to move 1 square away from one minion; they cannot make attacks of opportunity.
system.description: Once per encounter, force all enemies to move 1 square away from one of your minions without provoking attacks of opportunity.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, Deception or Persuasion vs Will in line of sight forces the target to withdraw or suffer -1 attack until end of encounter.
system.description: Once per encounter, Persuasion or Deception vs Will Defense; target must withdraw or take –1 attack until the end of the encounter.

system.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +5, Reconnaissance Team Leader
system.benefit: One of your followers gains +2 speed.
system.description: One follower gains increased speed.

system.benefit: When using Ward, add one-half your armor bonuses to the ally’s Reflex Defense.
system.description: When using Ward, add half your armor bonus to the ally's Reflex Defense.

system.benefit: Also gain Damage Reduction equal to twice your armor's equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense.
system.description: In addition to Armored Augmentation I, gain damage reduction equal to twice your armor's equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense.

system.benefit: Whenever you successfully redirect a blaster bolt and hit, deal +1 die of damage.
system.description: When you successfully redirect a blaster bolt and hit, you deal +1 die of damage.

system.benefit: Once per encounter allies in line of sight with less than half hit points gain hit points equal to your class level.
system.description: Once per encounter, allies in line of sight with less than half hit points gain hit points equal to your class level.

system.benefit: Disable security without a security kit; on a failure by 10 or more, something goes wrong.
system.description: Disable security systems without a kit; failures are more severe.

system.benefit: Add one damage die to the empowered weapon.
system.description: Your chosen melee weapon deals +1 additional die of damage.

system.benefit: With two pistols, even if you miss, deal damage equal to half your heroic level.
system.description: When attacking with two pistols, even if you miss, deal damage equal to half your heroic level.

system.benefit: When you aim before attacking and deal damage, move the target one step down the condition track.
system.description: When you aim before attacking and deal damage, move the target one step down the condition track.

system.benefit: For the rest of the encounter, choose one: +1 attack, +5 to skills, or +1 to defenses.
system.description: For the rest of the encounter, gain either +1 attack, +5 to skill checks, or +1 to all defenses.

system.benefit: After a successful Deception vs Will Defense in line of sight, the next attack by your ally against that target deals +2 dice of damage.
system.description: After a successful Deception check vs Will Defense, the next attack by your ally against the target deals +2 dice damage.

system.benefit: You are not required to move in a straight line when making an attack run.
system.description: You do not need to move in a straight line during an attack run.

system.benefit: Once per encounter reroll one Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma-based skill check (except Use the Force).
system.description: Once per encounter, reroll a Wisdom-, Intelligence-, or Charisma-based skill check (except Use the Force).

system.benefit: Add your Force Point result to an ally within 12 squares whose Use the Force modifier is lower than yours.
system.description: Add your Force Point result to an ally's roll if they have a lower Use the Force modifier.

system.benefit: If hit by an area attack, take half or no damage.
system.description: Take half or no damage from area attacks.

system.benefit: Substitute Use Computer for Gather Information if you have computer access.
system.description: Use Computer replaces Gather Information when accessing networks.

system.benefit: With a ranged attack, reduce the target’s cover by one step and deal half damage.
system.description: With a ranged attack, reduce a target's cover and deal half damage.

system.benefit: Gain Will Defense bonus equal to your class level.
system.description: Your Will Defense bonus equals your class level.

system.benefit: Show an ally in line of sight how to ignore difficult terrain until your next turn (does not apply to you).
system.description: Allow an ally to ignore difficult terrain until your next turn.

system.benefit: When targeted by a dark side power, roll two dice for rebuke attempt and take the better result.
system.description: When rebuking a Dark Side power, roll twice and take the better result.

system.benefit: You can always use rifles to make attacks of opportunity.
system.description: You may always use rifles to make attacks of opportunity.

system.benefit: Reroll Deception checks for a deceptive appearance.
system.description: Reroll Deception checks when maintaining a disguise.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, when you miss, move half your speed and attack another target without provoking attacks of opportunity; with Combat Reflexes, uses equal to Dex bonus (max once per round).
system.description: Once per encounter, when you miss, move half your speed and attack another target.

system.benefit: Armor does not reduce speed or distance moved.
system.description: Armor does not reduce your speed or distance moved.

system.benefit: Add your class level to Will Defense against Use the Force effects.
system.description: Add your class level to Will Defense against Use the Force.

system.benefit: If your damage exceeds a creature's DR, you ignore that DR for that attack.
system.description: If your unarmed damage exceeds damage reduction, ignore the damage reduction.

system.benefit: All allies within 6 squares may roll Perception when you do, taking the highest result.
system.description: All allies within 6 squares may roll Perception and use the highest result.

system.benefit: Your Battle Meditation grants +2 to attack instead of +1.
system.description: Your Battle Meditation grants +2 attack instead of +1.

system.benefit: When you take an all-out movement as the pilot, gain +2 Reflex Defense.
system.description: When using all-out movement as the pilot, gain +2 Reflex Defense.

system.benefit: When attacking with both weapons, you may make a full attack as a standard action.
system.description: You may make a full attack as a standard action when attacking with both weapons.

system.benefit: Once per turn, redirect an attack to an attracted minion.
system.description: Once per turn, redirect an attack to one of your attracted minions.

system.benefit: You can perform first aid one additional time per day on a target.
system.description: You may perform first aid one additional time per day on a target.

system.benefit: When you reduce an opponent to 0 hp, all opponents in line of sight of you and the target take -2 attack until your next turn.
system.description: When you reduce an opponent to 0 hit points, all enemies in line of sight take –2 attack until your next turn.

system.benefit: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains +1 attack.
system.description: Once per encounter, an adjacent ally gains +1 attack.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, spend a swift action to regain 10 shield rating (SR), up to the shield’s maximum, on an active personal shield.
system.description: Once per encounter, spend a swift action to regain 10 shield rating up to its maximum.

system.description: Create a 4×4 square safe zone; allies starting in it gain +2 Fortitude and Will Defense. Safe zones cannot overlap.

system.benefit: Once per round with unarmed, hold-out, dagger, or vibrodagger, reroll an attack.
system.description: Once per round, reroll an attack made with an unarmed strike, hold-out weapon, dagger, or vibrodagger.

system.benefit: Treat all exotic weapons as a single weapon group for proficiency and related effects.
system.description: Treat all exotic weapons as a single weapon group for feats and talents.

swse.description: Grants Weapon Focus (exotic melee) for any weapon group

system.benefit: Once per encounter, activate a Force talent that requires a Force Point without spending one.
system.description: Once per encounter, activate a Force talent that normally requires a Force Point without spending one.

system.benefit: Allies within 10 squares gain a +10 cover bonus if they are in cover until your next turn.
system.description: Allies in cover gain +10 cover bonus until your next turn.

system.benefit: As Personal Vendetta but designate one opponent to take -5 attack.
system.description: As Personal Vendetta, but designate one opponent to take –5 attack instead.

system.benefit: If engaged in melee and a ranged attack misses you, apply the same attack roll to target the attacker’s opponent instead.
system.description: If a ranged attack misses you in melee, it instead hits the attacker's opponent.

system.benefit: When using Repair or Mechanics, retemplates/apps/store an additional +1d8 hit points.
system.description: When using Repair or Mechanics with Aid Another, restore +1d8 hit points.

system.benefit: Make a DC 20 Acrobatics check to avoid falling prone.
system.description: You may make a DC 20 Acrobatics check to avoid falling prone.

system.benefit: Gain +1 die of damage against your prime target until end of encounter.
system.description: Deal +1 die of damage against your prime target until the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: Aid on Knowledge checks for an ally within 6 squares if you are trained in that Knowledge.
system.description: Aid an ally's Knowledge checks if you are trained and within 6 squares.
