system.description: With a DC 20 Mechanics check, disable all items of one type within 12 squares; only one jammer may be active at a time.

system.benefit: Give up your standard action to grant allies an extra action on their next turn.
system.description: Give up a standard action to grant all allies an extra action next turn.

system.benefit: Treat the advanced melee weapon as if you were holding it two-handed for Strength bonus purposes (double Str bonus).
system.description: Treat the advanced melee weapon as two-handed for Strength damage.

system.benefit: Once per turn, one ally in line of sight is immune to effects that make them flat-footed or deny Dexterity to Reflex Defense.
system.description: Once per turn, an ally is immune to effects that deny Dexterity to Reflex Defense.

system.benefit: You can attack with both weapons or a double-sided weapon against different targets.
system.description: You may attack with both weapons or a double weapon against different targets.

system.benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for rifles.
system.description: Reduce the attack penalty for making multiple attacks with rifles by 2.

system.benefit: With a melee attack against a target with your allies adjacent, reroll damage and keep the better result.
system.description: When attacking with adjacent allies, reroll damage and keep the better result.

system.benefit: Once per day, reroll an attack roll.
system.description: Once per day, reroll an attack roll and take the better result.

system.benefit: Once per encounter against a single enemy in line of sight, reroll your first attack roll and keep the best.
system.description: Once per encounter, reroll your first attack roll against a chosen enemy and keep the better result.

system.benefit: Reduce multiattack penalties by 2 for advanced melee weapons.
system.description: Reduce the attack penalty for multiple attacks with advanced melee weapons by 2.

system.benefit: Allow one ally within 6 squares to move their speed to become adjacent to you without provoking attacks of opportunity.
system.description: Allow one ally within 6 squares to move its speed to be adjacent to you without provoking attacks of opportunity.

system.benefit: If your melee attack damages an opponent denied Dexterity to Defense, that opponent cannot make attacks of opportunity.
system.description: If your melee attack damages an opponent denied Dexterity to Defense, that opponent cannot make attacks of opportunity.

system.prerequisites: Charisma 13, Power of the Dark Side
system.benefit: You and allies within 6 squares gain +1 to all Defense scores until end of encounter while you remain conscious.
system.description: You and allies within 6 squares gain +1 to all defenses while you remain conscious.

system.benefit: As a swift action, assist an allied starfighter within 2 squares to grant +5 Pilot in a dogfight.
system.description: Assist an allied starfighter within 2 squares; ally gains +5 Pilot checks in dogfights.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, regain all expended uses of Farseeing.
Move +2 squares if wearing light or no armor.
system.description: Increase speed by 2 squares when wearing light or no armor.

system.benefit: When spending a Force Point on an attack roll, you may roll an additional bonus die and take the best result. Doing so increases your Dark Side Score by 1.
system.description: When spending a Force Point on an attack, reroll the die and increase Dark Side Score by 1.

system.benefit: Use Deception to feint and shut off and reignite lightsaber as part of form actions.
system.description: Use Deception to feint by deactivating and reigniting your lightsaber.

system.benefit: Use Move Object to make an area attack (sizes: Large 2x2, Huge 3x3, Gargantuan 4x4, Colossal 6x6); compare Use the Force to Reflex Defense.
system.description: Use Move Object to create an area attack based on object size.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, take 20 on a Persuasion check with no increase in time required.
system.description: Once per encounter, take 20 on a Persuasion check without increasing time.

system.benefit: Reroll Knowledge checks when you are trained in that Knowledge.
system.description: Reroll Knowledge checks for skills in which you are trained.

system.benefit: Use the snipe action of Stealth as a swift action instead of a move.
system.description: Sniping with Stealth becomes a swift action instead of a move action.

system.benefit: Reroll Persuasion checks to haggle.
system.description: Reroll Persuasion checks when haggling.

system.prerequisites: Weapon Focus with a proficient weapon
system.benefit: Gain +1 attack with the chosen weapon.
system.description: Gain an additional +1 attack with a chosen proficient weapon.

system.benefit: Gain Bothan Spynet benefits plus two talents from Infiltration; Gather Information replaces Knowledge (galactic lore) and is considered trained.
system.description: Gather Information replaces Knowledge (galactic lore) and you are considered trained in it.

system.benefit: Use Stealth to conceal items on your person; you can take 10 even if rushed; conceal as a swift action.
system.description: Use Stealth to conceal items on your person; may take 10 even when rushed.

system.benefit: You do not lose Born Leader’s benefits if out of line of sight.
system.description: Born Leader remains active even when allies are not in line of sight.

system.benefit: You can modify a poison’s delivery method with a Knowledge (life sciences) check; DC equals the Treat Injury DC.
system.description: You may alter poison delivery methods with a successful Knowledge check.

system.benefit: Once per day, spend a Force Point for a 10-minute ritual to reroll Perception, Stealth, Farseeing, or an attack roll and regain unspent Force Points.
system.description: Once per day, spend 10 minutes and a Force Point to reroll key checks and regain unspent Force Points.

system.benefit: Grant +1 to one Defense; cannot reattune for 24 hours; only one talisman active at a time.
system.description: Gain +1 bonus to one defense; you may not create another Force Talisman for 24 hours.

system.benefit: Against a colossal size or smaller vehicle, a successful Pilot check turns a critical hit into a normal hit.
system.description: When piloting a Colossal or smaller vehicle, a successful Pilot check turns a critical hit into a normal hit.

system.benefit: Immune to disease, poison, and radiation.
system.description: You are immune to disease, poison, and radiation.

system.benefit: Enemies treat your Safe Zone as difficult terrain.
system.description: Enemies treat your safe zone as difficult terrain.

swse.description: When flat-footed, use your Will Defense instead

system.benefit: Battle Strike applies to your first attack each round until the end of the encounter.
system.description: Battle Strike applies to the first attack you make each round until the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: With Teras Kasi basics, unarmed attacks deal an additional damage die.
system.description: When making unarmed attacks, deal one additional die of damage.

system.benefit: If you move an opponent down the condition track with a melee attack, that target cannot take a standard or full-round action on its next turn.
system.description: If you move a target down the condition track with a melee attack, the target cannot take standard or full actions on its next turn.

system.benefit: Perform first aid as a standard action instead of a full-round action.
system.description: You may perform first aid as a standard action instead of a full-round action.

system.benefit: Dismiss your Safe Zone; allies who were in your old Safe Zone gain +2 speed.
system.description: Dismiss your safe zone; allies who were in it gain +2 speed.

system.benefit: +2 attack with a melee weapon; once per encounter you may forgo that bonus to gain +5 on a single damage roll.
system.description: Gain +2 attack with melee weapons; once per encounter you may remove this bonus as a free action to gain +5 on a single damage roll.

system.benefit: Redistribute defenses: -5 to two Defenses to add +5 to another Defense.
system.description: Take –5 to two defenses and gain +5 to another defense.

system.prerequisites: Martial Arts I-III, Teras Kasi Basics
system.benefit: Only full-round unarmed actions allowed; take full attack as a standard action.
system.description: When making only unarmed attacks as a full-round action, you may take a full attack as a standard action.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, all allies gain +1 attack while in line of sight and you remain conscious.
system.description: Once per encounter, all allies gain +1 attack while in line of sight.

system.benefit: Targets struck by a thrown lightsaber move at half speed (round down) until your next turn.
system.description: Targets struck by a thrown lightsaber move at half speed until the end of your next turn.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, make Deception vs Will Defense against a target in line of sight; target must spend a swift action with their standard action to attack until your next turn.
system.description: Once per encounter, force a target to spend a swift action to attack.

system.benefit: Use Mind Trick on beasts with Intelligence 2 or less; they cannot perform or understand complex directions.
system.description: You may use Mind Trick on beasts with Intelligence 2 or lower.

system.benefit: If you damage an opponent, all allies within 3 squares gain +2 damage against that target.
Once per encounter when an ally is attacked, your Deception check can substitute for their defense; if it fails, the effect is not used.
system.description: Once per encounter, when an ally is attacked, your Deception check replaces their Defense; if the check fails, the talent is not expended.

system.benefit: Jury-rig as a standard action instead of full; no check required to jury-rig; move the vehicle +3 steps up track instead of +2.
system.description: You may jury-rig as a standard action without making a check and move the target up three steps on the condition track.

system.benefit: When making a ranged attack not at point-blank range, add half your class level to damage.
system.description: When making a ranged attack outside point-blank range, add half your class level to damage.

system.benefit: Gain one follower with Armor Proficiency feat and trained in Perception; may be taken up to three times.
system.description: Gain a loyal follower trained in Perception.

system.benefit: If your attack with an amphistaff, thud bug, or razor bug also exceeds the target’s Will Defense, the opponent is flat-footed against you.
system.description: If your attack also exceeds Will Defense, the opponent is flat-footed against you.

system.benefit: +10 threshold for you and an adjacent ally when adjacent to a colossal or smaller allied ship.
When you aid another's attack with a vehicle weapon, the attack deals +1 die damage; an ally may only benefit once per attack.
system.description: When aiding another's vehicle attack, deal +1 die damage; an ally may benefit only once per attack.

system.benefit: Gain +2 to Block and Deflect with a lightsaber you built.
system.description: Gain +2 on Block and Deflect when using a lightsaber you built.

system.benefit: Make a single ranged attack with a thrown lightsaber comparing to Reflex of all targets in a 6-square line; on miss target takes half; DC 20 to return.
system.description: Make a single ranged attack with a thrown lightsaber against all targets in a 6-square line; half damage on a miss, DC 20 to return.

system.benefit: If you pilot a colossal or smaller vehicle, capital ships take -20 to attack (not -10) and cannot score critical hits unless you would be hit.
system.description: When piloting a Colossal or smaller vehicle, capital ships take –20 on attack rolls and cannot score critical hits unless they would hit normally.

system.benefit: Increase penalties to -2 on affected rolls.
system.description: Increase Inspire Fear penalties to –2.

system.benefit: If an ally moves, you may move before your next turn, ending within 3 squares of that ally.

Negate a ranged attack with a Use the Force check vs the attack roll; -5 penalty each additional time used in a round; must have an activated lightsaber, be aware, and not flat-footed; vs autofire: take half or no damage; may spend a Force Point to protect an adjacent character.
system.description: Negate a ranged attack with a Use the Force check equal to the attack roll.

system.benefit: On a critical hit, target cannot move on its next turn.
system.description: On a critical hit, the target cannot move on its next turn.

system.benefit: Select an enemy in line of sight and make Knowledge (galactic lore) vs DC 15 + target’s character level; learn up to two pieces of information about the enemy.
system.description: Make a Knowledge check to learn information about an enemy in line of sight.

system.benefit: Once per turn, designate a target; your movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity from that target if you move adjacent.
system.description: Once per turn, your movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity from a designated adjacent target.

system.benefit: If your attack exceeds the target’s Fortitude Defense, the target is poisoned; poison attacks each round with d20 + your heroic level vs Fortitude, deals 1d6 + half your heroic level damage, and moves the target down the condition track until it misses or is cured.
system.description: When your attack exceeds Fortitude Defense, you poison the target.

system.benefit: When you aim before attacking, if the attack deals damage, move the target one step down the condition track.
system.description: When you aim before attacking, move the target one step down the condition track if damage is dealt.

system.benefit: Take any or all damage that would target an adjacent ally; cannot use again until the end of your next turn.
system.description: Take any or all damage for an adjacent ally; remaining damage applies to the original target.

system.benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense against a target in line of sight; if successful, one ally cannot be attacked until your next turn.
system.description: A successful Persuasion check prevents an enemy from attacking one ally until your next turn.

system.benefit: Once per turn, redirect an attack to an attracted minion; the minion gains Reflex Defense equal to half your class level.
system.description: Once per turn, redirect an attack to a minion; the minion gains Reflex Defense equal to half your class level.

system.benefit: Ignore cover (not total cover) with razor bugs and thud bugs.
system.description: Ignore cover (except total cover) when throwing razor bugs or thud bugs.

system.benefit: +1 attack rolls and +1 die damage against Force-sensitives.
system.description: Gain +1 attack and +1 die of damage against Force-sensitive opponents.

system.benefit: When you damage an opponent with a Force power, they suffer an additional 2d6 damage at the start of their next turn.
system.description: When you damage an opponent with a Force power, the target takes +2d6 damage at the start of its next turn.

system.benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will Defense against your Hunter's Target to impose -5 to their Will Defense as long as you keep line of sight.
system.description: Make a Persuasion check vs Will Defense; your Hunter's Target takes –5 Will Defense while you maintain line of sight.

system.benefit: +1 Reflex and +1 Will Defense while wielding a lightsaber.
system.description: Gain +1 Reflex Defense and +1 Will Defense while wielding a lightsaber.

system.benefit: If you have concealment against a target, gain +5 Perception against that target.
system.description: Gain +5 Perception against targets when you have concealment.

system.benefit: If someone attacks from the haze, they lose concealment but the rest of the group retains it.
system.description: When an attack occurs, only the attacker loses concealment.

system.benefit: Each once per encounter after you attack: if you damage the target, gain +2 Reflex Defense against them; or if you are damaged, move 2 squares; or if you miss, gain +2 on your next attack.
system.description: After you attack, gain a situational bonus depending on whether you hit, miss, or are damaged.

system.benefit: Attract nonheroic minions with levels equal to 3/4 your level; may have multiple minions.
system.description: Attract a nonheroic character of three-quarters your level; may be taken multiple times.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, if you drop a foe to 0 hp or to the bottom of the track, you gain an extra standard action.
system.description: Once per encounter, when you reduce a foe to 0 hit points or the bottom of the track, gain a bonus standard action.

system.benefit: Create blasts in a line or cone: length = 2× radius; cone length = 3× blast radius; origin from explosive’s square.
system.description: Explosions may be shaped into a line or cone originating from the explosive's square.

system.benefit: Standard action make a Persuasion check vs Will Defense (+5 bonus if opponent higher level); target moves -1 down condition track; if at end, target cannot attack unless attacked or allies attacked.
system.description: As a standard action, make a Persuasion check vs Will Defense; target moves -1 down the condition track and may not attack unless attacked.

system.benefit: Gain an extra use of the selected power from disarm, slam, thrust, or Move Object.
system.description: Gain an additional telekinetic Force power when you take Move Object.

system.benefit: If you move at least 2 squares, gain +1 attack until your next turn.
system.description: If you move at least 2 squares, gain +1 attack until your next turn.

system.benefit: 1/encounter deploy Tiny turret: Init +4, Perception +4, Reflex Def 10, 10 hp, threshold 8, damage 3d6; must be adjacent to you to operate.
system.description: Once per encounter, deploy a Tiny blaster turret adjacent to you with 3d6 damage.

system.benefit: Avoid moving down the condition track from effects caused by your designated opponent.
system.description: You do not move down the condition track from your Hunter's Target.

system.benefit: Once per turn, grant use of a Force Technique to an ally within 12 squares who is trained in Use the Force; not for Force Point recovery.
system.description: Once per turn, grant use of a Force Technique to an ally within 12 squares trained in Use the Force.

system.benefit: Designate one Force power; remove another power to refresh the designated power; you move -1 step down the condition track for 1 minute.
system.description: Designate a Force power to replace another; you move -1 down the condition track for 1 minute.

system.benefit: Point-blank range increased by 5 squares; short range begins 5 squares later but ends at the same distance.
system.description: Point-blank range increases by 5 squares; short range begins 5 squares later but ends at the same distance.

system.benefit: Reduce opponent’s DR by 5 with a single weapon group.

swse.notes: Weapon group specific - applies when using designated weapon group

system.benefit: With a DC 15 Knowledge (tactics) check, determine which allies or opponents in line of sight are at half hit points.
Designate a single target and gain +5 attack with an attack run.
system.description: Designate a single target and gain +5 attack with attack runs.

system.benefit: Catch a Second Wind as a reaction instead of a swift action.
Mend a damaged or disabled biotech device as a standard action instead of a full action.
system.description: You may mend damaged or disabled biotech as a standard action.

system.benefit: Attempt to rebuke a Force power; if you fail, lessen its effect by one step; only works on powers with variable effects.
system.description: Rebuke a Force power; on a failed rebuke, reduce its effect.

system.benefit: If adjacent or in the same square as a foe, gain +1 melee attack.
system.description: When adjacent to or sharing a square with an enemy, gain +1 melee attack.

system.benefit: You and allies gain +1 to all defenses against the target.
system.description: Gain defensive bonuses against a surveilled target.

system.benefit: Mechanics vs a droid’s Will Defense within 6 squares; on success the droid can take only swift actions; affects one droid at a time.
system.description: Make a Mechanics check vs a droid's Will Defense; if successful, the droid may take only swift actions.

system.benefit: Against an adjacent opponent, on a successful lightsaber attack, reduce the target’s speed by 2 squares until the end of your turn.
system.description: Against adjacent opponents, if you hit with a lightsaber attack, reduce the target's speed by 2 squares.

system.benefit: Return one Force power to any ally within 6 squares and line of sight (one ally’s spent use).
system.description: Return one Force power to any ally within 6 squares and line of sight.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, return any light side power without spending a Force Point.
system.description: Once per encounter, regain a Light Side Force power without spending a Force Point.

system.benefit: Reroll Persuasion when haggling over bounty prices.
system.description: Reroll Persuasion checks when haggling over bounty prices.

system.benefit: An ally affected by Battle Meditation reduced to 0 hp may take Second Wind as a reaction and falls unconscious.
system.description: When an ally under your Battle Meditation is reduced to 0 hit points, they may take a Second Wind as a reaction.

system.benefit: Automatically improve the attitude of an indifferent NPC to friendly with no check required.
system.description: Automatically improve an indifferent character's attitude to friendly without a skill check.

system.benefit: Each follower gains the Point Blank Shot feat.
system.description: Followers gain the Point Blank Shot feat.

system.benefit: With DC 25 Mechanics and 1 hour, create an item worth 200 × class level credits; item cannot be rare or illegal, destroyed after 24 hours, usable once per day.
system.description: Once per day, create a temporary device with a Mechanics check; the item is destroyed after 24 hours.

system.benefit: All gear you purchase has +50% hit points, +5 Damage Reduction, and you gain +2 on Mechanics checks with those objects.
system.description: All gear you purchase gains +50% hit points, +5 damage reduction, and +2 on Mechanics checks made with it.

system.benefit: Immediately after making a full attack with two pistols, you may move your speed as a free action.
system.description: After making a full attack with two pistols, you may move your speed as a free action.

system.benefit: DC 15 Mechanics check to add hit points to a vehicle equal to 5 × class level.
system.description: With a DC 15 Mechanics check, restore hit points equal to 5 × your class level to a vehicle.

system.benefit: Once per day, make a skill check as if trained; may be used multiple times per day with separate skills.
system.description: Once per day, make a trained skill check even if untrained.

system.benefit: If within 6 squares, pull the weapon back as a swift action with a DC 20 Use the Force check.
system.description: When within 6 squares, you may pull back a thrown empowered weapon as a swift action with a Use the Force check.

system.benefit: Gain +2 damage with a single weapon group.
system.description: Gain +2 damage with a chosen weapon.

system.benefit: If you damage an opponent with a piercing attack, the opponent’s speed is -2 until the end of your next turn.
No penalty to attack when using Rapid Shot.
system.description: You take no attack penalty when using Rapid Shot.

system.benefit: Use the Force in place of Deception when creating a deceptive appearance.
system.description: Use the Force replaces Deception to create a deceptive appearance.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, if the opponent is at half hit points or less, make Persuasion vs Will Defense (+5 if the opponent is higher level); target cannot attack unless attacked or allies are attacked.
system.description: Once per encounter, force a wounded opponent to surrender unless attacked.

system.benefit: On a critical hit, target suffers -2 Reflex Defense until healed to full hit points.
system.description: On a critical hit, the target takes –2 Reflex Defense until healed to full hit points.

system.benefit: If stun damage exceeds the threshold, the target moves -3 on the condition track instead of -2.
system.description: When stun damage exceeds a target's damage threshold, move the target –3 down the condition track instead of –2.

system.benefit: Use the Force vs Will Defense to create an illusion; see source details for specific effects.
system.description: Use the Force vs Will Defense to create a visual or auditory illusion.

system.benefit: Critical range extends to 19–20 and 19 is not an automatic hit.
system.description: Critical hits occur on a 19–20; a 19 is not an automatic hit.

system.benefit: If not treated, at end of encounter the implanted target moves -3 down the condition track and requires rest or surgery to recover.
When you damage an opponent, you may move through that opponent’s square; attacks of opportunity apply as normal.
system.description: When you damage an opponent, you may move through their square.

system.benefit: You can use Block with cortosis gauntlets; on a successful Block, targeted lightsabers are deactivated.
Use Pilot in place of Use Computer for astrogation or operating sensors.
system.description: Pilot replaces Use Computer for astrogation and sensors.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, affect up to 3 creatures within 12 squares with Dark Healing using Use the Force vs Fortitude; on success you heal half the damage dealt.
system.description: Drain life from up to three creatures within 12 squares; damage and healing scale with class level.

system.benefit: When you grab an opponent, they must use a full-round action to break the grab (not a standard).
system.description: Opponents you grab must use a full-round action to escape.

system.benefit: 1/encounter deploy Tiny stun turret: Init +4, Perception +4, Reflex Def 10, 10 hp, threshold 8, deals 3d6 stun; must be adjacent to you to operate.
system.description: Once per encounter, deploy a stun turret adjacent to you.

system.benefit: You may take a readied action at the end of the current turn after an opponent takes its action.
system.description: Take a readied action at the end of the current turn.

system.benefit: DC 15 Tactics check: allies gain +1 attack vs flanked targets or +1 Defense vs attacks of opportunity next turn; synergizes with Born Leader/Battle Analysis for +2.
system.description: Allies gain +1 attack vs flanked enemies or +1 defense vs attacks of opportunity.

system.benefit: Create Sith Talisman (+d6 damage to Force powers or lightsabers, grants a Dark Side point on first use) or create Sith Weapons/Armor with Sith templates.
When using Mechanics to set explosives, deal +2 dice of damage; may be taken multiple times and stacks.
On a critical hit, you can reduce the target’s speed by half until fully healed.
system.description: On a critical hit, reduce the target's speed by half until fully healed.

system.prerequisites: Noble Fencing Style, base attack bonus +5
system.benefit: Once per encounter, make a single melee attack against an adjacent enemy who just damaged you.
system.description: Once per encounter, make a melee attack against an adjacent enemy who just damaged you.

system.benefit: When you use Assault Tactics, the target takes a cumulative -1 Reflex each time it is damaged (max -5).
system.description: Targets take cumulative –1 Reflex Defense each time they are damaged (maximum –5).

system.benefit: You may reroll a Use the Force check to avoid detection by other Force users; must take the reroll even if worse.
system.description: You may reroll Use the Force checks to avoid detection; must keep the second result.

system.benefit: Reroll opposed Use the Force checks to conceal your presence.
system.description: Reroll opposed Use the Force checks to conceal your presence.

system.benefit: Once per turn, when you damage a target with a non-area attack, make Persuasion vs Will Defense to control that target's move action.
system.description: Once per turn, after damaging a target, make a Persuasion check to determine their next move action.

system.benefit: Issue a routine command to a computer.
system.description: Issue a routine command to a computer.

system.benefit: Increase Lightsaber Defense bonus by +2 (maximum +5).
system.description: Increase Lightsaber Defense bonus by 2 (maximum 5).

system.benefit: When using a Dark Side Force Power, you may reroll your Use the Force check; you must accept the result. You can no longer use Light Side Force Powers.
system.description: Reroll Dark Side skill checks and Use the Force checks, but you can no longer use Light Side abilities.

system.benefit: +2 on Wisdom checks when gambling; may be taken multiple times.
system.description: Gain a +2 bonus on Wisdom checks made while gambling; may be taken multiple times.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, when an adjacent ally is reduced to 0 hp or below threshold, you may move your speed to become adjacent and take the damage instead.
system.description: Once per encounter, move your speed to become adjacent to an ally reduced to 0 hit points and take the damage instead.

system.benefit: Persuasion vs Will in line of sight forces targets to move away from you; if they cannot move, fear effect doubles.
system.description: Make a Persuasion check vs Will Defense; affected targets must move away from you or suffer doubled fear effects if unable to move.

system.benefit: Once per turn a number of allies equal to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) within 12 squares and line of sight may withdraw as a free action.
system.description: Once per turn, a number of allies equal to your Charisma modifier may withdraw as free actions.

system.benefit: Once per encounter set a trap for a single vehicle in line of sight that activates on that vehicle's immediate move action.
system.description: Once per encounter, force a vehicle in line of sight to immediately move.

system.benefit: Target an object you hold; read impressions up to 5 years per level.
system.description: Read impressions from an object you hold, seeing events from the past.

system.benefit: If you take damage from a Force power, you deal +2 damage against that creature until the end of the encounter.
Once per encounter designate an opponent as your Hunter's Target; damage vs that target increases by an amount tied to your bounty hunter level.
system.description: Once per encounter, designate a target and deal bonus damage equal to your class level.

system.benefit: Choose a Force power; you may reroll Use the Force checks for that power.
system.description: Choose a single Force power; you may reroll Use the Force checks made to activate that power.

system.benefit: Gain +2 on opposed grapple checks.
system.description: Gain +2 on opposed grapple checks.

system.benefit: Catch a Second Wind one extra time per encounter.
Suppress morale and insight bonuses for all in line of sight until your next turn.
system.description: Suppress morale and insight bonuses to enemies in line of sight until your next turn.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, when an ally makes a successful melee attack against a target adjacent to you, make a reaction attack with +2 attack.
system.description: Once per encounter, when an adjacent ally hits with a melee attack, make an attack as a reaction with +2 attack.

system.benefit: When you make a riposte, you do not count the initial block penalty.
system.description: When you make a riposte, the initial Block penalty does not apply.

system.benefit: When you jury-rig a vehicle, it moves -2 down the condition track at end (instead of -5).
system.description: Once per encounter, your vehicle avoids moving down the condition track.

system.benefit: Automatically leave no trace of tampering; on a failure by 10+, something goes wrong (instead of by 5).
system.description: You automatically leave no trace when tampering with devices.

system.benefit: When you deal damage with a melee attack and exceed the target’s threshold, move the target 1 step down the condition track.
system.description: If a melee attack exceeds a target's damage threshold, move the target one step down the condition track.

system.benefit: When you aim before attacking and succeed, knock the target prone (target no larger than two size categories).
system.description: When you aim before attacking, you may knock the target prone if it is no more than two size categories larger than you.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, make an attack of opportunity against an opponent in point-blank range if they provoke an attack of opportunity from an ally.
system.description: Once per encounter, make an attack of opportunity against an enemy in point-blank range.

system.benefit: Negate a melee attack with a Use the Force check vs the attack roll; -5 penalty each additional time used in a round; must have an activated lightsaber, be aware, and not flat-footed; may spend a Force Point to protect an adjacent character.
system.description: Negate a melee attack with a Use the Force check equal to the attack roll.

system.benefit: Once per turn when your Hunter's Target attempts to withdraw, you may make an attack of opportunity.
system.description: Once per turn, if your Hunter's Target attempts to withdraw, you may make an attack of opportunity.

system.benefit: One enemy in line of sight loses all insight and morale bonuses on attacks and cannot be aided until the end of your next turn.
system.description: An enemy loses insight and morale bonuses and cannot be aided.

system.benefit: Once per round, redirect a blaster bolt you deflected to another target; not usable against autofire or non-blaster projectiles.
system.description: Once per round, redirect a deflected blaster bolt at another target.

system.benefit: Full-round action; spend a Force Point; allies within 6 squares gain +1 attack for the encounter while within 6 squares.
system.description: Spend a Force Point as a full-round action; allies within 6 squares gain +1 attack for the encounter.

system.benefit: Your minions may reroll Persuasion checks to Intimidate.
system.description: Your minions may reroll Persuasion checks made to intimidate.

system.benefit: With Knowledge (galactic lore) DC 15 + target level, gain +2 to one defense vs that target.
system.description: Use Knowledge (galactic lore) to gain +2 to one defense against a studied target.

system.benefit: Each once per encounter after you attack: if you damage the target, impose -5 Reflex; or reduce the target’s speed by 2; or against two opponents within 2 squares, each takes -5 attack but you roll damage once.
system.description: After you attack, impose penalties or bonuses based on positioning.

system.benefit: Once per encounter an adjacent ally gains +5 to threshold.
system.description: Once per encounter, an adjacent ally gains +5 damage threshold.

system.benefit: Enemies in line of sight lose competence/insight/morale/dodge bonuses to Reflex Defense; opposed check to resist.
system.description: Enemies lose morale, insight, dodge, and competence bonuses to Reflex Defense.

system.benefit: No penalty when using improvised weapons.
system.description: You take no penalty when using improvised weapons.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, allies in line of sight with less than half hit points gain +2 Reflex, +2 Will, and +2 damage.
system.description: Once per encounter, wounded allies gain bonuses to defenses and damage.

system.benefit: Gain +5 on skill checks made to perform a Force Regimen.
system.description: Gain +5 bonus on skill checks made to perform a Force Regimen.

system.benefit: Ignore door and wall thresholds when using mines and non-grenade explosives.
system.description: Ignore damage thresholds of doors and walls when using mines or non-grenade explosives.

system.benefit: Your trusty sidearm bonus also applies to any rifle or carbine.
system.description: The benefits of Trusty Sidearm also apply to rifles and carbines.

system.benefit: When an ally in line of sight takes Second Wind, all enemies within 2 squares lose Dexterity to Defense until the end of your next turn.
system.description: Enemies lose Dexterity to Defense when an ally uses Second Wind.

system.prerequisites: Dual Weapon I, Weapon Proficiency (advanced), Weapon Proficiency (pistols)
system.benefit: With a single attack using an advanced melee weapon, make a free pistol attack.
system.description: When attacking with an advanced melee weapon, make a free pistol attack.

system.benefit: When you use a damage-dealing Force power against a creature with Dark Side Score 1+, deal extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1).
Once per encounter after the first full round, add +5 to Initiative.
system.description: Once per encounter after the first round, gain +5 Initiative.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, as an action, add your armor bonus to Reflex Defense for threshold until end of encounter.
system.description: Once per encounter, add your armor bonus to Reflex Defense and damage threshold until the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: Reroll Initiative checks.
system.description: Reroll Initiative checks and keep the better result.

system.benefit: When using Unrelenting Assault, every adjacent target takes damage equal to your Strength bonus with a melee weapon.
system.description: When using Unrelenting Assault, all adjacent targets take damage equal to your Strength bonus.

system.benefit: Once per encounter all allies within 12 squares and line of sight move +2 up the condition track but take -2 to attack and skill checks for a number of rounds equal to your class level.
system.description: Once per encounter, allies within 12 squares move +2 up the condition track but take –2 attack and skill checks for rounds equal to your class level.

system.benefit: Gain low-light vision for 1 minute or the rest of the encounter, whichever is longer.
system.description: Gain low-light vision for 1 minute or the encounter.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, grant the prerequisite of a chosen talent to every ship in your squadron until the end of the encounter.
system.description: Once per encounter, grant the prerequisite of a talent to every ship in your squadron until the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: All opponents within 6 squares take -1 attack.
system.description: Opponents within 6 squares take –1 attack.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, negate an attack of opportunity and move half your speed without provoking; with Combat Reflexes, uses equal to Dex bonus (max once per round).
system.description: Once per encounter, negate an attack of opportunity and move half your speed.

system.benefit: Any ally who starts in your Safe Zone and then exits it gains +2 attack.
system.description: Allies who start in your safe zone and then leave it gain +2 attack.

system.benefit: Once per encounter against an adjacent droid reduced to 0 hp, Mechanics vs Will Defense to capture: target moves +2 up the track, gains d8 hp and becomes friendly.
system.description: Once per encounter, target an adjacent droid reduced to 0 hit points; make a Mechanics check to restore it and render it friendly.

system.benefit: If you occupy the same space as a larger vehicle, gain +5 cover bonus.
system.description: While occupying the same space as a larger vehicle, gain a +5 cover bonus.

system.benefit: If you exceed the target's threshold, push the target 1 square.
system.description: If you exceed a target's damage threshold, push the target 1 square.

system.benefit: Modify items to add Sith Alchemy traits.
system.description: Modify items to gain Sith Alchemy traits.

system.benefit: Once per turn, if your Will Defense is targeted, you may replace Will with a Use the Force check; you take -5 to Use the Force until the end of your next turn.
system.description: Replace Will Defense with a Use the Force check when targeted.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, reduce an effect that would move you down the condition track by 1 step.
system.description: Once per encounter, reduce by 1 step the amount you would move down the condition track from an attack.

system.description: Once per turn, redirect an attack to a minion; the minion gains Reflex Defense equal to your class level and makes a free attack against the attacker.

system.description: Your mount shares an empathic link with you; it uses your Reflex and Will Defense, and you gain its senses.

system.benefit: Gain +2 damage with lightsabers.
system.description: Gain +2 damage with lightsabers.

system.benefit: Place mines as a standard action instead of a full-round action.
system.description: You may place a mine as a standard action instead of a full-round action.

system.benefit: Gain total concealment in place of any concealment.
system.description: Gain total concealment whenever you have concealment.

system.description: Once per turn, after damaging a target, make a Persuasion check to determine their next swift action.

system.benefit: Negate an attack targeting an adjacent allied colossal or smaller ship using vehicular combat.

system.benefit: When you pilot a vehicle, smaller vehicles attempting to dogfight take a -10 penalty instead of -5.
system.description: When piloting a vehicle, smaller vehicles attempting to dogfight you take a –10 penalty instead of –5.

system.benefit: If you are in a melee, ranged attacks against you take an additional -5 penalty (on top of the firing-into-melee penalty).

system.benefit: If adjacent to an ally, you cannot be flanked.

system.description: You may attack during the surprise round.

system.benefit: Immune to all mind-affecting effects for 1 minute.
system.description: Gain immunity to all mind-affecting effects for 1 minute.

system.benefit: Use the Force replaces Perception to avoid surprise, notice enemies, and sense deception or influence; you are considered trained.
system.description: Use the Force replaces Perception to avoid surprise and detect deception.

system.benefit: Allies take no or half damage from your area attack.

system.benefit: Use the Force replaces Deception checks and is treated as trained.
system.description: Use the Force replaces Deception; you are considered trained.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, increase the speed of allies in line of sight by 2.

system.benefit: Double your speed for 1 round; must wait 5 rounds between uses.

system.description: Use the Force replaces Treat Injury; you may treat without a medkit or medpac.

system.benefit: Reroll Persuasion checks to Intimidate.
system.description: Reroll Persuasion checks made to intimidate.

system.benefit: Reroll Knowledge (life sciences) or Treat Injury checks to use or repair biotech.

system.benefit: Designate an ally to move immediately at normal speed; must move immediately or the effect is wasted; usable three times per turn.

system.benefit: Spend a remaining Farseeing power to regain any other expended Force power.
system.description: Spend a Farseeing power to regain any other Force power.

system.benefit: Grant a melee weapon +1 attack.
system.description: Gain +1 attack with a chosen melee weapon.

system.benefit: When you score a critical hit, gain a free standard action; must be used before your next turn or it is lost.

system.benefit: Use the Force DC 15; remove Farseeing and add 1 Force Point to an ally in line of sight; replaces normal effect.

system.description: One adjacent ally gains +1 Reflex Defense as long as they remain adjacent.

system.benefit: Spend 1 minute to remove an accessory and add another to a lightsaber you built.
system.description: Spend 1 minute to remove and add accessories on a lightsaber you built.

system.benefit: Once per day, reroll a skill check.

system.description: Ignore concealment penalties except total concealment.

system.description: Upon death, become a Dark Side spirit able to possess creatures or objects.

system.description: If you fail a Treat Injury check, the patient does not take additional damage.

system.description: When using Rapid Shot with two pistols, gain +2 damage.

system.description: An ally may make a skill check as a move action instead of a standard action.

system.description: You may use Sentinel's Gambit additional times per encounter equal to half your class level.

system.benefit: If you deal damage exceeding current HP and threshold, deal half damage and sever (special effect) while moving down the track.
system.description: If damage exceeds the target's current hit points and damage threshold, deal half damage again, move the target down the condition track, and sever a limb.

system.benefit: Reroll Perception checks.
system.description: Reroll Perception checks and keep the better result.

system.benefit: Reduce multiattack penalty by 2 for advanced melee weapons.
system.description: Reduce the attack penalty for multiple attacks with advanced melee weapons by 2.

system.benefit: Standard action; spend a Force Point to hide you and allies up to your class level; make Use the Force vs Will; lasts 1 minute or until you attack from haze.
system.description: Spend a Force Point to conceal yourself and allies; lasts 1 minute or until an attack is made.

system.benefit: +5 equipment bonus to an ally's untrained check and treat the ally as trained (not for Use the Force).
system.description: Grant an ally a +5 equipment bonus on an untrained skill check and treat them as trained (except Use the Force).

system.benefit: When an opponent withdraws, that opponent is considered flat-footed against you until the end of your next turn.
system.description: Opponents withdrawing from you are flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

system.benefit: Once per encounter negate the effect of a single attack or skill check made vs your Will Defense.
system.description: Once per encounter, negate the effect of a single attack or skill check that targets your Will Defense.

system.benefit: If hit by an area attack while moving, take half or no damage.
system.description: If hit by an area attack while moving, take half or no damage.

system.benefit: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, the target takes -2 attack against anyone but you.
system.description: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, that opponent takes -2 attack against anyone but you.

system.benefit: Once per round, target within 12 squares and line of sight takes -5 to one skill until the start of your next turn.
system.description: Once per round, impose a -5 penalty to one skill check for a target within line of sight.

system.benefit: Make Perception vs a target in line of sight (DC 15 or Stealth if higher); you and allies gain +2 attack until next turn and while out of the target’s line of sight.
system.description: Gain attack bonuses against a target you successfully observe.

system.benefit: Any cover bonus to your Reflex Defense is +2 when adjacent to a minion.
system.description: If adjacent to a minion, any cover bonus you receive is increased by +2 Reflex Defense.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, if within 2 squares of cover or concealment, move to it and make a Stealth check as a single move action.
system.description: Once per encounter, move into cover or concealment and make a Stealth check as a single move action.

system.benefit: Make Persuasion vs Will; target cannot attack anyone within 6 squares if you do not have cover.
As Weaken Resolve, but the target continues fleeing beyond the initial duration.
system.description: Targets affected by Weaken Resolve continue fleeing.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, turn a critical hit against you into a normal hit.
system.description: Once per encounter, turn a critical hit against you into a normal hit.

system.benefit: When you score a critical hit with a lightsaber, gain a temporary Force Point to be used before the end of the encounter.
Gain +5 Perception against your prime target until the end of the encounter.
system.description: Gain +5 to Perception checks against your prime target until the end of the encounter.

system.benefit: If you take damage for an ally, gain Damage Reduction equal to your class level until the end of your next turn.
system.description: When you take damage for an ally, gain damage reduction equal to your class level until the end of your next turn.

system.benefit: No penalty with vehicle weapons even if you are not the pilot.
system.description: Suffer no penalties when using vehicle weapons while not piloting.

system.benefit: May use Block or Deflect to protect an adjacent ally without spending a Force Point.
system.description: Use Block or Deflect to protect adjacent allies without spending a Force Point.

system.benefit: Once per turn, one adjacent ally can aid another as a reaction to assist you if they have not already aided.
An attack against an opponent denied Dexterity to Defense moves them -1 step down the condition track.
system.description: Attacks against flat-footed enemies move them down the condition track.

system.benefit: When you roll a natural 20 with a damage-dealing Force power, do not regain powers for damage; target also takes half damage again at the start of your next turn.
system.description: On a natural 20 with a damaging Force power, do not regain the power and deal half damage next turn.

system.benefit: +2 on attacks of opportunity with rifles.
system.description: Gain +2 on attacks of opportunity made with rifles.

system.benefit: Allies hidden in the haze can reroll Perception checks and keep the best; allies gain +2 damage against unaware foes.
system.description: Allies concealed by Force Haze may reroll Perception checks and gain +2 damage against unaware foes.

system.benefit: If you damage a target with an area attack, the target is flat-footed against you until your next turn.
system.description: If you damage a target with an area attack, the target is flat-footed against you until your next turn.

system.benefit: Once per turn allow one ally within 12 squares to reroll Deception or Stealth.
system.description: Once per turn, allow an ally within 12 squares to reroll Deception or Stealth.

system.benefit: If an opponent uses Aim to negate your cover, they must succeed on a Stealth check vs the attacker’s Initiative to remove your cover.
system.description: When an opponent uses Aim to negate your cover, make a Stealth check opposed by Initiative to retain cover.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, after a successful feint you may make an attack with a light melee weapon or lightsaber.
system.description: Once per encounter, after a successful feint, make an immediate attack with a light melee weapon or lightsaber.

system.benefit: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, you can take 10 on Persuasion checks.
system.description: When you damage an opponent with a lightsaber, you may take 10 on Persuasion checks for Adept Negotiator.

system.benefit: You may take half or all damage for an adjacent ally; an ally may take the same for you.
system.description: You or an ally may take half or all damage for an adjacent ally.

system.benefit: Increase Sentinel Strike damage die to d8 instead of d6.
system.description: Increase Sentinel Strike damage dice from d6 to d8.

system.benefit: Speed is not reduced by difficult terrain.
system.description: Your speed is not reduced by difficult terrain.

system.benefit: Retrieve and load an energy cell or power pack as a single swift action.
system.description: Retrieve and reload an energy cell or power pack as a single swift action.

system.benefit: Reroll Treat Injury checks to repair or modify biotech devices.
system.description: Reroll Treat Injury checks made to repair or modify biotech.

system.benefit: On a natural 20 attack roll, gain an extra Force Point for the encounter.
system.description: When you roll a natural 20 on an attack, gain a temporary Force Point.

system.prerequisites: Any One Force Technique, Weapon Focus (Lightsabers)
system.benefit: Choose any Force Technique or a lightsaber form and add it to your usable options.
system.description: Select a lightsaber form and gain access to it.

system.benefit: Increase fly speed by 2 squares.
Grant one enemy +1 attack; one ally gains +2 attack.
system.description: Grant one enemy +1 attack while giving one ally +2 attack.

system.benefit: You and one follower each make a ranged attack against a target in line of sight, each taking -5 to attack.
When you move a target -1 down the condition track, their speed is halved until the condition is removed.
system.description: When you move a target down the condition track, their speed is halved until the condition is removed.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, add +1 damage die to a grenade or explosive.
system.description: Once per encounter, deal +1 die of damage with a grenade or explosive.

system.benefit: Become proficient with any exotic weapon feat even if you do not possess the feat.
system.description: You are proficient with any exotic weapon even if you do not possess the feat.

system.benefit: Healing Boost increases damage healed by 2 points per class level.
system.description: Increase damage healed by Vital Transfer by 2 points per class level.

system.benefit: If the target is unaware of you when you attack, your ranged attacks deal +1 damage die.
system.description: If the target is unaware of you, deal +1 die of damage with ranged attacks.

system.benefit: Convert energy from Negate Energy to activate any power in your suite.
system.description: Convert energy damage you negate into the ability to activate a Force power.

system.benefit: Deal +2 damage against targets damaged by an ally since the end of your last turn (stacks up to +10).
When you deal damage at the end of a charge, you knock the target prone if no more than one size larger than you.
system.description: When you deal damage at the end of a charge, knock the target prone if it is no more than one size larger than you.

system.benefit: Sabotage an object with an energy cell/power pack to turn it into a grenade; can be retemplates/apps/stored with a swift action.
system.description: Convert an object with an energy cell or power pack into a grenade.

system.benefit: Modify biotech in half the usual time and cost; may take 10 on Mechanics checks for biotech work.
system.description: Biotech modifications take half the normal time and cost; you may take 10 on Mechanics checks.

system.prerequisites: Dual or Single Weapon Flourish I
system.benefit: Add Dexterity to melee damage with light melee weapons; double Dexterity bonus if wielding two-handed.
system.description: Add Dexterity modifier to melee damage with light melee weapons; double if wielded two-handed.

system.benefit: Once per encounter, return one lightsaber form to your suite without spending a Force Point.
system.description: Once per encounter, return one expended lightsaber form to your suite without spending a Force Point.

system.benefit: Once per encounter forgo your extra move to attack; if you hit and damage with a melee attack, you switch places with the opponent.
system.description: Once per encounter, forgo an extra move to attack; if successful, switch places with the opponent.

system.benefit: Use the Force vs Will to detect Force sensitivity, number of powers known, and Force Points.
system.description: Use the Force to detect Force sensitivity, powers known, and Force Points.

system.benefit: Once per round, shield an ally; attacks that would target the ally target you instead.
No attack penalty in low or zero gravity; ignore space sickness; proficient with starship weapons.
system.description: Ignore penalties in zero gravity and gain proficiency with starship weapons.

system.benefit: Opponents in a dogfight with you take a -10 penalty to attack.
system.description: On an opposed Pilot check, opponents in a dogfight take –10 to attack rolls.

system.benefit: Expend farseeing from your suite; before end of your next turn, force an attacker to reroll an attack and keep the second result.
system.description: Force an attacker to reroll an attack and keep the second result.

system.benefit: When you aid another to suppress an attack, the enemy takes -5 on its attack instead of -2.
Gain a follower trained in Perception and Stealth (max 3 times); follower can make Stealth checks with you.
system.description: Gain a follower trained in Perception and Stealth; may be taken multiple times.

system.benefit: Once per encounter forgo your extra move to add +5 to one Defense until the end of your next turn.
system.description: Once per encounter, forgo an extra move to gain +5 to one defense until the end of your next turn.

system.benefit: During the surprise round, you and allies within 6 squares gain +1 attack; you retain the +1 attack against targets you damage.
system.description: During a surprise round, you and allies within 6 squares gain +1 attack; you retain the bonus against damaged targets.
